title: An Act relative to protecting the public from street takeovers

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Markey of Dartmouth, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Christopher M. Markey and Steven George Xiarhos for legislation to establish penalties for reckless or negligent operation of a vehicle and hindering the movement of other vehicles.  The Judiciary.
